definition[0]: bread that has been heated so that it is brown on both sides and no longer soft
example[0]: I had a piece of toast for breakfast.
definition[1]: if you drink a toast to someone, you drink something in order to thank them, wish them luck etc
example[1]: Iâ€™d like to propose a toast (=ask people to drink a toast) to the bride and groom.
definition[2]: to drink a glass of wine etc to thank someone, wish someone luck, or celebrate something
example[2]: They toasted the birth of their new baby with champagne.
definition[3]: to make bread or other food brown by placing it close to heat
definition[4]: to sit near a fire to make yourself warm
example[4]: Tom was toasting his feet by the fire.
